# **Data Preparation**
## Data Cleaning
```{r}
day_raw %>%
  summarise(across(everything(), ~ sum(is.na(.)))) %>%
  pivot_longer(everything(), names_to = "variable", values_to = "missing_count") %>%
  arrange(desc(missing_count)) %>%
  kable(caption = "Missing Values iÂ n Day Dataset")
```

## Feature Engineering
```{r}
day <- day_raw %>%
  mutate(date = as_date(dteday),
         year = year(date),
         month = month(date, label = TRUE),
         weekday = wday(date, label = TRUE),
         weekend = if_else(weekday %in% c("Sat", "Sun"), 1, 0)) %>%
  select(date, year, month, weekday, weekend, temp, atemp, hum, windspeed, casual, registered, cnt)
glimpse(day)
```

```{r}
day <- day_raw %>%
  mutate(
    dteday = as.Date(dteday),
    year = ifelse(yr == 0, 2011, 2012),
    month = month(dteday, label = TRUE),
    weekday = wday(dteday, label = TRUE),
    weekend = if_else(weekday %in% c("Sat", "Sun"), 1L, 0L)
  ) %>%
  arrange(dteday) %>%
as_tsibble(index = dteday)

day %>%
  has_gaps()
```

```{r}
summary(day$cnt)
stopifnot(nrow(day) == 731)  # expected daily records per dataset description
```
